short_summary: Psychometric testing tool and group reports for Defence Team Coaching Program
description: The Defence Team Coaching Program's coaching services are directly related to promoting a culture of leadership, respect, and honour through the strong, secure, engaged defence policy.
full_summary:
### Psychometric Testing Tool and Group Reports

#### Solicitation Number
W7809A123047
#### Solicitation Posting Date
2023-02-09

The vendor is invited to submit a proposal for the procurement of psychometric testing tools and group reports to support the Defence Team Coaching Program (DTCP). The tools will be used to assess leadership capacity, identify strengths and areas for improvement, and reinforce professional growth for senior leaders and chief warrant officers.

The successful vendor will be required to provide bilingual (English and French) emotional intelligence tests and personality tests, in addition to technical support for account administration on a vendor-hosted platform. The vendor must also provide access to a reliable contact person for test-related questions and ongoing technical support.

The tests must meet the following requirements:

* Be scientifically validated
* Have a test-retest reliability index higher than 0.7
* Be easy to interpret and use by certified administrators and program candidates
* Be available in both official languages to meet defence language requirements
* Provide certification for administrators of the emotional intelligence test

The vendor must deliver the tests within 7-10 days prior to coaching program start dates. The tests must also be available in multiple versions to accommodate different level groups. The vendor must provide training for DTCP-certified coaches and offer continuing education to enhance their knowledge and skills.

The estimated quantities and prices for the services are provided below:

* A. Emotional Intelligence Assessments EQ-i 2.0 (individual tests)
	+ Unit price: $739
	+ Estimated total price: $ [ Insert amount at contract award ]
* A. EQ-i 360 Assessment Group Reports
	+ Unit price: $739
	+ Estimated total price: $ [ Insert amount at contract award ]

### Attachment

The solicitation document, including the statement of work, is attached to this notice. The vendor must review the document carefully and ensure that their proposal meets the requirements outlined.

The notice URL for this solicitation is not provided as the solicitation document is contained within this notice. Suppliers may contact Viktoria Melnichuk, Viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca, for any questions or concerns.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this solicitation are not outlined in this notice. Suppliers are encouraged to review the solicitation document for detailed information.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of National Defence.

### Notice Calendar

* Publication Date: 2023-02-09
* Tender Closing Date
